2025.title: Binocular Shot
2025.description: A tribute to movies with inaccurate binocular shots.

2024.title: Bluesky Looky Looker
2024.description: Find out which Bluesky lists and starter packs you're on.

2024.title: Are.na Manager
2024.description: An Obsidian plugin that lets you publish content from Obsidian to Are.na and the other way around.

2024.title: Type Simulator
2024.description: Type Simulator offers an easy way for anyone to enhance their typesetting skills. It exposes users to a range of real-life scenarios where typing might occur, such as on board a ship, in a dark, misty forest, under the influence of mind-altering psychedelic drugs, or in zero-gravity environments

2023.title: Letterboxd scrapper
2023.description: A script that scrapes films from a Letterboxd user's public diary.

2023.title: Walking Poem
2023.description: A website that writes psychogeographical poems using real Google Maps directions from your current location to a random place around you.

2023.title: Music Snitch
2023.description: Show the music you are currently scrobbling.

2022.title: Dale
2022.description: Generate DALL·E 2-like images without an invite. Without AI. Without writing a prompt. Without waiting for the process to finish. Without wasting electricity or emitting CO2. Just drag and drop an image and let the most advanced technology (well, JavaScript) do the rest.

2022.title: Dear Reader
2022.description: Dear Reader sends you articles and posts from your favorite newsletters and RSS feeds directly to your Kindle.

2021.title: aire-madrid
2021.description: Node package to get information about Madrid's air quality. It's probably bad (the air quality, I mean.)

2021.title: Avisos Madrid
2021.description: This repository contains notices and incidents reported by Madrid's citizens regarding street furniture, lighting, urban and waste cleaning, green areas, sidewalks, etc. Automatically updated every 10 minutes.

2021.title: Binocular Shot
2021.description: A tribute to movies with inaccurate binocular shots.

2021.title: Boletín Botánico
2021.description: Mysterious little zine of whimsical periodicity, dubious content, dangerous editing, and suspicious ambition.

2021.title: Figma Avatar
2021.description: Update your Twitter avatar and banner from the comfort of Figma.

2021.title: Go With The Flow
2021.description: A text threading plugin for Figma.

2021.title: Paul Virilio Bot
2021.description: A bot that tweets variations of a famous Paul Virilio quote.

2020.title: BiciMap
2020.description: An alternative and open-source map of BiciMAD.

2020.title: Kindle to Are.na
2020.description: Send your Kindle's highlights and notes to Are.na.

2020.title: Txtnau
2020.description: A bot that looks at art and tweets what it sees.

2019.title: Favicon Chameleon
2019.description: Makes your tab disappear when nobody is paying attention.

2019.title: I Remember Bot
2019.description: A tribute to Georges Perec's 'Je me souviens' in the form of a bot.

2019.title: Map with Me
2019.description: A tool for creating collaborative maps with your friends (and enemies).

2019.title: OMG Movies!
2019.description: A bot that loves films but doesn't have a very good memory.
